title: Discovery Vinwonder World Review
content:
It was okay to stay at Discovery VinWonder World. The only reason I love about Vinwonder is their staff who are very friendly and helpful while we stay at the villa. The complaints I would say is checking-in process. It was disorganized and there is very unprofessional because there is no welcome drink or anybody guided us where to stay for the checking process counter until we need to ask someone. It is very unacceptable for a big corporation. Furthermore, they donâ€™t let us know how long will it take for the processing of check-in. Also, the facility seemed broken and nobody check before we got them room. The headboard of the bed is falling out, the restroom spray in the toilet is broken; the floor of the swimming pool is lifting which is very dangerous. Also, the water faucet in the bathtub is leaking which I almost fall out while using the bathroom. If I would pay that amount of money again, I would choose somewhere else.

title: Ky nghi he 2017
content:
Khach san co vi tri rat thuan loi, gan bien va gan quang truong noi co rat nhieu hoat dong vui choi va giai tri cho nguoi lon va tre em. Gia dinh chung toi rat hai long ve dich vu va cung cach phuc vu cua doi ngu nhan vien khach san rat la chuyen nghiep. Dac biet rat cam on ban Uyen Chi da tu van va lua chon cho gia dinh chung toi phong family rong rai phu hop voi gia dinh co con nho,va co view dep thuan tien de ngam bien luc binh minh va hoang hon. Chung toi da luu tru o khach san rat nhieu lan, lan nao cung co nhung trai nghiem rat dac biet,cam nhan rat sau sac ve khach san havana va thanh pho bien nha trang. Chung toi se som quay lai Nha Trang de tan huong khong khi cua thanh pho bien va su than thien cua cac ban tai havana . Cung rat mong gap lai ban Uyen Chi
 Cam on cac ban nhieu
 Qui Ton

title: Trai nghiem tuyet voi tai Havana
content:
Gia Dinh toi co mot chuyen du Lá»‹ch nghi DÆ°Æ¡ng tuyet voi tai Nha trang do la nho duoc nghi tai Havana hotel Nha Trang.
 Chung toi that bat ngo voi lan di nay vi toi book phong Gia dinh. No ngoai suy nghi cua minh khi nhan duoc 1 phong Gia dinh rong rai, sach dep dung dang cap 5 sao va duoc nhieu toan Canh bien Xinh Dep cua Nha Trang.
 Su phuc Vu an can va chu Dao cua nhan vien khach san lam cho Gia Dinh toi cam thay rat thoai mai.
 Cac mon An sang rat phong phu, ngon va ve sinh. 
 Voi dÆ°Æ¡ng ham di xuyen qua duong toi bien lam cho vo con toi thay co tinh rieng tu, Dich Vu tai bo bien nhu ghe ngoi tren bai bien va tam nuoc ngot, khan choang lam tang them su khac biet cho chung toi...
 Toi thich tap Gym va spa o Havana vi chat luong Dich Vu kha tot ma toi khong can phai di ra ngoai.
 Toi se quay lai o Havana khi toi di du lich Nha trang lan toi.
 Cam on Havana da cho Gia Dinh toi cam Giac tuyet voi trong chuyen nghi duong vua qua.

title: Ky nghi tuyet voi
content:
Khach san co vi tri rat dep,co bai bien rieng va dac biet co duong ham qua duong Tran Phu la mot an tuong rat lon voi toi.Chinh vi vay toi da quay lai khach san de thuong thuc cac mon an sang rat ngon,hop khau vi.,toi len skylight uong ruou va nghe nhac,thu gian.
 Phong khach san dep va gia rat hop ly,nhan vien than thien.
